review: I had visited the hospital and it was regular checkup. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I can surely recommend doctor to others. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went. I had back pain operation before. Physiotherapy was suggested. Doctor was friendly.
I consulted the doctor for normal check-up. Treatment was fine by doctor. I would like to recommend this doctor to my family and friends. There was no waiting time in the hospital.
Doctor did not explain side effects of the drug he prescribed. Doctor not answering when called during pain sos. Poor experience with Apollo Medical centre as always
